title: DC3 Incident Core Extension
description: A core extension of the Incident object to allow core details of the Incident to be shared while tracking major details tied to the incident's timeline.  Multiple Incidents can be tied together via relationships if a higher degree of fidelity is needed across phases.

extension_type.description: Defined by STIX 2.1 extension definition rules from 'extension-type-enum'.

contact_numbers.description: A list of contact number objects that contain the phone and fax numbers.

contact_number.description: The contact number.  Typically a phone number.

contact_number_type.description: The type of number this is used for.  This SHOULD be drawn from contact-number-ov.

description.description: An additional description for the phone number and its purpose

email_addresses.description: A list of contact number objects that contain the phone and fax numbers.

email_address_ref.description: A reference to the email address itself

email_address_type.description: The type of email that address is used for.  This SHOULD be drawn from email-contact-ov.

description.description: An additional description for the email and its purpose

first_name.description: The first name of an individual

last_name.description: The last name of an individual

middle_name.description: The middle name of an individual

prefix.description: A prefix or title for an individual such as “Mr” or “Ms”

suffix.description: A suffix for the individual such as “PhD”
